name: RAsh
description:
RAsh is a puzzle-platformer where you are managing the inventory and the equipment of Ash. You have to equip the right tool at the right time. But be carefull, Ash is collecting everything he found on his path. So make sure that there is some space left for important items and treasures !

Features :

30 levels to explore in 5 various environments

8 musics

8 different pieces of equipment with specific properties to discover.
